short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Understand your spending by tracking your recurring expenses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Submarine: Understand Your Expenses

Dive into your subscriptions, memberships, and licenses with Submarine, the extension that helps you understand your recurring payments.

😃 No Account Required
Track everything with no sign-up needed. All your data is saved locally and synced with your Google Chrome profile.

📝 Effortless List-Building
Quickly add and edit recurring subscriptions, from streaming services to annual memberships. Manage your entire list in one convenient place.

📆 See What’s Ahead
Stay organized with an "Upcoming" view that highlights your next billing dates so you’re never caught off guard.

📊 Insights for Smarter Spending
Visualize your monthly spending trends and find opportunities to cut back or adjust as needed.

🔒 Submarine respects your privacy. We don’t collect any personal or financial data, keeping your subscription tracking private.

Take control of your recurring payments and make sure you’re never surprised by a billing date again. Try Submarine today!
